data.title: The Team: Meet the people who make it work
data.meta_description: Get to know the the core team members at Sererra who are dedicated in serving our clients.
data.text:
Vijay Saha

Founder & CEO

Vijay is the Founder and the CEO of Sererra Consulting Group, an IT Professional Services firm offering integrated turnkey ERP, CRM and eBusiness solutions to small and medium sized businesses. Vijay also served as CEO of Micamart Limited, a trading company based in London and Susco Electronics, an electronic components distribution company based in NY. Vijay has his Masters of Business Administration (MBA) from Ashridge Business School (City University, UK).

Sunita Goel-Saha

Co-Owner

Sunita is a Co-owner & CFO of Sererra and oversees Sererra’s administrative, financial, and risk management operations of the company. Sunita is focused primarily on driving the company’s overall growth and development. Sunita has a Degree in Psychology from University of Bombay.

Antonia Gorneo

NetSuite Implementation

Antonia is a member of our NetSuite Implementation Team and a Certified Public Accountant (CPA) in the Philippines. She worked with Oracle NetSuite for more than 3 years where she earned Certifications as Administrator, ERP Consultant, Financial User and SuiteAnalytics User. Before joining Oracle NetSuite, Antonia served as a Senior Accountant in a Manufacturing firm for over 3 years gaining solid foundation in Inventory Management and Factory Processes. She specializes in Supply Chain Management (SCM), Warehouse Management System (WMS) and Manufacturing.

Mark Warrick

Project Manager

Mark is a project Manager with 20 years of experience of working in the information technology and services industry. Mark is skilled in requirements gathering, documentation and project tracking. When he’s not leading the charge at Sererra, removing road blocks and helping everyone communicate, you’ll find him leading tours through all the mountains in Southern California on his mountain bike. Mark also defends the flock at Saddleback Church as a volunteer in the security ministry, keeping children and adults safe during worship services.

Kushaal Saha

Client Success

Kushaal is part of Sererra’s Client Success team that is responsible for supporting client adoption and continued satisfaction with our services and our platform of products. Before joining Sererra, Kushaal interned at Merril Lynch and Time’s Group. Kushaal has an BA in Business, with emphasis on Marketing and Accounting from California State University, Fullerton.
